synonyms: at the end of the day
when all is said and done
definitions.example: Ultimately, he will have to make a decision before the end of the week.

definitions.definition: Used to indicate the etymon at which a given etymological derivation terminates.
definitions.example: Cognate to Gottscheerish boßər, bàsser. Ultimately cognate to standard High German Wasser.

synonyms: at the end of the day
when all is said and done
